text: (And hath made of service unto you whatsoever is in the heavens) the sun, the moon, the stars and the clouds (and whatsoever is in the earth) the trees, the beasts, the mountains and the seas; (it is all from Him) all these are from Allah. (Lo! Herein) in that which I have mentioned (verily are portents) are signs and lessons (for people who reflect) upon what Allah has created.
